text: Blue Puppy () is a 1976 Soviet animated movie directed by Yefim Gamburg.Во Владивостоке открылась выставка "Все-все-все"ГОЛУБОЙ ЩЕНОК (1976) == Voice cast == * Mikhail Boyarsky as a Pirate * Alisa Freindlich as Blue Puppy * Alexander Gradsky as a Sailor and the Sawfish * Andrei Mironov as a Black Cat == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1976 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: Blue Puppy
